SUMMARY 
Agile software engineer with 4+ years of work experience in iterative development environments. Known for keen 
problem-solving  skills  and  a  talent  for  meeting  challenging  deadlines  without  compromising  software  quality.  A 
strong  team  player  with  a  passion  for  continuous  improvement  and  the  ability  to  adapt  quickly  to  changing 
requirements. My extensive professional background includes successful tenures at Accenture and HCL Technologies, 
where  I  honed my  skills  in  collaborating with  cross-functional  teams  and  consistent  improvement  in performance

where  I  honed my  skills  in  collaborating with  cross-functional  teams  and  consistent  improvement  in performance 
and expectations.
